title: UI Web Sofware Engineer (Hybrid)
description: Who You AreYou are excited to build innovative products and features. You excel by finding daily opportunities to grow at the same pace as the technology we're building, and you build partnerships that improve our business. Likewise, you're someone who sees feedback as an opportunity to learn and grow and believe decisions powered by data are the norm. You care about the wellbeing of others and yourself.For a results-oriented team member who consistently delivers in alignment with client-centric quality standards, this job is perfect. Our culture is super positive, we take 100% responsibility for our work and results. We have the courage to say “please”, “thank you”, “I’m sorry” and “I don’t know”. The potential for growth is limitless for the right person.If you want to help grow a company (ours and the clients), express the best parts of yourself and have a major impact on a company’s future, this is an ideal role. Who We AreAn award-winning company, ranked in the top 1% for growth by Inc 5000, MAS Global Consulting is a leader in Software Development and Digital Solutions, uniquely servicing mid to large Enterprise customers globally. With headquarters in Tampa, Florida, our teams make it possible for companies, such as Johnson Controls, Bloomberg, Affirm and Dell to meet deliverables on-time and provide new products and features for their customers and internal stakeholders providing ease of engagement. Regardless of client size, we help solve their technical challenges. MAS is a diverse community of dedicated experts and trusted partners. We deliver custom software solutions with a MAS experience that creates value for everyone.Our ValuesStrength. Consistency. Responsibility. These values help us transform digital ideas into reality.ALL-IN MENTALITY:Proactive, engaged, agile, accountable, with integrityTOGETHER, WE ARE MORE:We live collaboration and teamworkSTAY CURIOUS:We pride ourselves in being innovative and life-long learnersWE CARE:We value our people, clients, community, society and the planetMAS EXPERIENCE:We focus on relationships, delivery, responsiveness, flexibility, and outcomes MAS Global Consultingis 100% Hispanic woman owned,was recently certified as a Great Place to Work, has appeared on the Inc 5000 list five years in a row, has been slated in the top 3% of Hispanic owned companies in the US by Stanford, has a MAS Future Foundation that offers scholarships and continuing education for girls and women in tech. Every team member placed on a client project directly and positively impacts the Foundation.Overview:The successful candidate has an opportunity to join an outstanding team to enhance offering solutions for a Top Fortune 500 company and global leader in financial services, to the world's most important corporations, governments and institutions in more than 100 countries.We place our value in our people comprised of diverse, bold, energetic, A-players who believe in discovering solutions, building great products, pay parity, and who strive to achieve the improbable. title: Web and Application Developer
description:
In-Office Position | Local Candidates Only | Office located in Santa Ana, CA
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: $60,000.00 - $75,000.00 per year
Benefits
Medical and dental insurance. 401(k) plan. Paid vacation. Paid sick time. Paid holidays. Parental Leave.Life Insurance
We are looking for an outstanding Web Developer to be responsible for the coding of innovative websites, help automate and structure organization data, and build internal or external web applications. Web Developer responsibilities include collaborating with other developers and team members, maintaining clean code and source control, and striving to learn and apply new technologies wherever possible.
Experience REQUIRED - MINIMUM OF 3 YERS EXPERIENCE, subject, but not limited to the following:
SQLJavaScriptNextJSNodeJSAPI ImplementationAmazon Web Services (EC2, S3, RDS)Salesforce AdministrationCI/CD FamiliarityPuppeteer AutomationSource Control (git)Agile DevelopmentPortfolio or Github (examples and projects)React
The Web Developer position focuses on implementing pixel-perfect, user-focused creative solutions for a variety of uses. The individual will ensure that our online user experiences are optimized for usability, responsiveness, and exceptional visual design.  Our Web Developer will work in a team alongside other developers and ui/ux designers in an agile workflow, and is expected to excel in daily collaboration and check-ins. We are looking for someone with experience implementing a variety of tech stacks, and expertly translate business objectives into engaging, functional, and simple designs and interfaces. An ideal candidate will be able to show a strong digital portfolio/github and have a good understanding of data structures, coding languages, and problem solving.
Preferred Field Of Expertise
Solid understanding of JavaScript frameworks, specifically React and well known packages.Experience with server side frameworks such as NextJS.Solid understanding of source control (git) and agile development.Comfortable with Relational Databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and Non-Relational Databases (MongoDB, Firebase) and experienced implementing front end interfaces to interact with database layer.Understanding of web fundamentals, web development, various coding languages, as applicable, and search-engine optimization (SEO) best practices.Comfortable with Amazon Web Services such as EC2, S3, RDS, etc.Experience building all things WordPress. This includes building custom themes from the ground up, editing child themes, global and page-specific CSS styles, and navigating through plug-ins.Good communication skills, excels in collaboration, and offers solutions to challenges or problems.Understanding of web optimization and accessibilityAppreciates data science, and data reporting.Has Salesforce Administration Experience.EDUCATION - BS in Computer Science or related field preferred

When you’re part of our program, you become a member of our dynamic community- a community where everyone becomes capable of growth and change. Our treatment entails mental, emotional, and spiritual healing. Our experienced clinicians provide a combination of individualized and group therapies tailored to foster self-awareness and long-term recovery. Yes, you’ll learn the basic relapse prevention tips and coping skills. But you’ll also learn how to unleash your passion and purpose. title: Customer Service - Entry Level
description:
At Precision Marketing we have teamed up with the global organizations that focus heavily on giving back to our local community and delivering superior public support. Specializing in engagement, we leverage our deep expertise in customer service and outreach to develop and execute customized and strategic public involvement plans to fit the specific needs of every client we represent. Our primary focus is to make a positive impact in our local communities and bring our client’s marketing and brand initiatives to life!
Do You:
Want to make a positive impact on your local community? Enjoy putting a smile on someone’s face?Have a willingness to learn and grow professionally? Thrive in a fast-paced, high-energy environment? Adapt quickly to change? Have a passion for people? 
If so, Our Entry Level Customer Service Associate position may be the ideal role for you!
Entry Level Customer Service Associate Responsibilities:
Plan and execute effective front-end marketing outreach activity, qualify eligible customers, and improve revenue growthEnhance our client's brand in the community by maintaining professionalism and a welcoming demeanor Act as the main representative and presenter to our local community Collaborate with the Marketing and Sales team to implement the local strategy for growing brand awarenessParticipate in mandatory training and staff development sessions
Entry Level Customer Service Associate Requirements:
Love for people and making an impact in our local communityPossess the right balance of people, sales, and communication skills Ability to build rapport quickly, lower trust barriers, and build confidence with consumersAmbitious and self-sufficient individual who approaches every situation with integrity and passionExceptional public speaking and presentation abilities Outstanding verbal and written communication skills Prior experience as a Customer Service Associate, Client Relations, Outreach Representative or Marketing
Candidates with the following experience are encouraged to apply: Community Outreach, Community Engagement, Community Marketing, Community Management, Community Coordinator, Entry Level, Entry Level Marketing, Entry Level Sales, Entry Level Public Relations, Entry Level Customer Service, Entry Level Management, Entry Level Business, Entry Level Advertising, Entry Level Communications

title: Application Developer
description:
Summary/Objective:
The Application Developer provides top quality solutions that meet application solution needs of Elevations Credit Union business line departments. This is a journey level role responsible for translating software requirements into well-designed solutions; working with 'off the shelf' software, modifying it and integrating it into the existing architecture; and maintaining programs for business applications.
Essential Functions:
Utilizes sound software development life cycle (SDLC) practices and accurately follows established procedures for delivering application solutions that support critical business strategiesWorks closely with suppliers to ensure successful software or hardware implementation, maintenance, and supportCommits application configuration updates to stage / test environment and plans for rollbacksTroubleshoots issues and resolving incidents in support of existing production applicationsInitiates action to correct quality problems or notifies others of quality issues as appropriatePrepares documentation and provides user training on new system applicationsWorks closely with suppliers to ensure successful software or hardware implementation and supportFacilitates architecture review and ensures that all architectural products are updated and maintainedMaintains understanding of the full architecture stack with an ability to communicate effectively on a variety of information technology (IT) topicsIdentifies and solves technical, process, or interpersonal problems to ensure projects are delivered within required timelines and expectations
Reports to: 
Application Development Manager
Manages:
This role does not have supervisory responsibility
Requirements
Required Education and Experience:
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent related work experienceThree (3) years of experience in application development which includes supporting business applications for diverse operating systems and platforms and/or structured query language (SQL) development for relational databasesExperience with Episys and PowerOn developmentExperience with financial institution technologies: Jack Henry technologies (Episys, Synapsys, Synergy, ARCU), OpCon, etcDemonstrated knowledge of architecture / systems engineering best practices, systems process design, software design, programming principles, or equivalent processesAdequate knowledge of Object Oriented programming and networking
Preferred Education and Experience:
Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or field of study related to the work performedExperience with FiServ DNA, FIS Miser, Corelation Keystone, MeridianLink, Encompass, Digital Insight, Q2, COTS, Image CenterMainframe coding experience using COBOLProject management experience in an iterative project management methodologyExperience supporting business applications within a financial institutionAbility to program in at least one programming language, such as JavaScriptFamiliarity with the Unix operating system, Unix shell scripting, or similarExperience with one or more scripting languages (PowerShell)Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) certification, or previous work within an ITIL environment
Work Environment:
Elevations uses multi-factor authentication to keep our data safe. As such, a personal smart phone is a requirement for employment with us. This job operates in an office setting and routinely uses standard office equipment
Physical Requirements:
Sitting frequently, walking occasionally, use of hands frequently, hearing constantly, talking frequently, exerting up to 10 lbs of force occasionally to lift, carry, push, pull, or move objects
Position Type/Expected Hours of Work:
Full time / 40 hours per week
Classification:
Exempt
Location: 
Broomfield, CO - Elevations BasecampThis role can be performed on site at the location above, or remotely for any individual who resides within Colorado, Wyoming, Oklahoma, Nevada, or North Carolina
Compensation:
The midpoint of the budgeted range is $99,081 + annual bonus. The candidate's starting salary will be adjusted based upon his, her, or their experience
Other Duties:
Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities, and activities may change at any time with or without notice. 
Must-Haves
3 years experience as an Application Developer (this is different from Full Stack Development experience)Experience with financial institution technologies: Jack Henry technologies (Episys, Synapsys, Synergy, ARCU), OpCon, etcExperience with Episys and PowerOn development
Nice-To-Haves
Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or field of study related to the work performedExperience supporting business applications within a financial institution
Benefits
Dental Insurance, Medical Insurance, Vision Insurance, Life Insurance, Retirement, Work From Home, Paid Time Off
Sign on Bonus: Negotiable
Relocation Package: Partial
Bonus Description
6% (of salary) annual bonus dependent on company performance
Company Culture & Perks
When joining Elevations, you can expect to work for a company with:
A leadership team that strives to make this the best place you’ve ever worked!A focus on supporting our employees’ mental, physical, and financial well-beingA commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion recognized by the Denver Business Journal and Colorado Association of RealtorsA highly engaged workforce devoted to innovation, continuous improvement, and collaborationA reputation for excellence, as evidenced by being a two-time recipient of the Malcolm Baldrige National Quality AwardA passion for consistently providing amazing experiences and creating raving fans
If you join our team, here are some of the perks you can expect:
A competitive total rewards package with 4 weeks paid time off for full-time employees, work anniversary paid time off, paid volunteer time off, and 12 paid holidaysComprehensive medical, dental, and vision plans with employer contributions to supercharge your Health Savings AccountUp to a 4% match on 401(k) contributionsSix weeks of fully paid parental leaveAn extensive Employee Assistance Program that provides personalized care options for your whole householdAmple opportunity to learn, develop and grow with access to LinkedIn Learning, career and leadership development programs, job shadowing, a mentor program, and tuition reimbursement up to $5,250/year

title: Entry Level Python Developer (Remote)
description:
SYNERGISTICIT is aware that the Job Market is Challenging because of Tech Layoffs. The Job market is flooded with hundreds and thousands of laid-off Jobseekers competing with existing Jobseekers. For entry-level Job seekers to get client interviews and jobs they need to differentiate themselves by ensuring they have exceptional skills and technologies to be noticed by clients.
Since 2010 we have helped Jobseekers differentiate themselves by providing clients with candidates who have the requisite skills and experience to outperform at interviews and clients. Here at SynergisticIT We just don't focus on getting you a Job we make careers. All Positions are open for all visas and US citizens We at Synergisticit understand the problem of the mismatch between employer's requirements and Employee skills and that's why since 2010 we have helped thousands of candidates get jobs at technology clients like Apple, Google, and Paypal, western union, Client, visa, Walmart labs, etc., to name a few. We have an excellent reputation with the clients. Currently, we are looking for Entry Level Python Developer (Remote)
Who Should Apply Recent Computer Science/Engineering /Mathematics/Statistics or Science Graduates looking to make their careers in IT Industry We welcome candidates with all visas and citizens to apply. We assist in filing for STEM extension and also for H1b and Green card filing to Candidates
We also offer Skill enhancement programs for candidates who are either missing skills or lacking Industry/Client experience with Projects and skills. Candidates have difficulty finding jobs or cracking interviews or want to improve their skill portfolio. If they are qualified with enough skills and have hands-on project work with clients then no need for skill enhancement.
Candidates can benefit from skill enhancement if they fall into the below categories.
Candidates who Lack Experience or are fresher with No actual Job experience with projects with clients who Have had a break in careers Lack Technical Competency or skills being demanded by clients Different visa candidates (Like OPT/H4EAD/L2EAD) who want to get employed and settle down in the USA please check the below links to see success outcomes of our candidates (url removed)
Watch the below videos of us participating in Industry events with the Top companies in Technology at Oracle Cloud World/Oracle Java One (Las Vegas) and at Gartner Data Analytics Summit (Florida)

If you have relevant skills and industry experience, please apply if not then candidates can opt for Skill enhancement.
For getting help with interviews please visit
(url removed)
REQUIRED SKILLS For Java /Software Programmers
Bachelor's degree or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Information Systems, IT
Highly motivated, self-learner, and technically inquisitive
Experience in programming language Java and understanding of the software development life cycle
Project work on the skills
Knowledge of Core Java, java script, C++ or software programming
Spring boot, Micro-services, Docker, Jenkins and REST API's experience
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
For data Science/Machine learning
Required Skills
Bachelor's degree or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Information Systems, IT
Project work on the technologies needed
Highly motivated, self-learner, and technically inquisitive

Please understand skills and relevant experience on real-world projects are required by clients for selection even if it's a Junior or entry-level position the additional skills and Project work with hands-on experience building projects at the client site are the only way a candidate can be picked by clients. If not having the skills or hands-on project work at the client site, candidates can opt for skill enhancement to gain the required skills and project work. please only apply to the posting

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Position: Graphic Designer (Part-time, 20 hrs a week)

Duration: 8 Weeks (Possible extension)

Location: REMOTE

Pay Rate: $45/hr on W2
Temporary Part-time position- an average of 20hrs a week for a few weeks to cover worker LOA. Some weeks may be less, and some may be more but will average 20. No OT allowed.Possibility for extension dependent upon worker return.Remote work with video conferencing, and strong Wi-Fi is necessary. Note: Please submit a portfolio with a resume submittal, portfolio will need to show demonstrated graphic skills, aesthetic skills, and web designer skills.

Job Description

Talented Graphic Designer to join the Marketing Creative Strategy team on a temporary basis. This person will work with writers, content strategists, visual interface designers, and project managers to develop creative for internal communications, advertising, promotional elements, emails, and sales collateral to support the Client's Brand and business units within Sales, Marketing, and Communications.

Description
 Graphic design and layout for sales brochures and collateral material, infographics, email, web, digital signage, and displays or exhibits. Ensure all materials follow the Brand creative guidelines found in the company style guide to ensure materials are consistent with the Client's Brand creative style.
Skills
 Excellent design skills in Adobe Creative Suite: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign Proficient in Microsoft PowerPoint, and Word on both PC and Mac platforms Experience working in SalesForce or a similar email creation/distribution platform Experience in Drupal or similar CMS Basic HTML knowledge preferred
About Us

Established in 2004, SPECTRAFORCE is one of the largest and fastest-growing diversity-owned staffing firms in the US. SPECTRAFORCE is built on the concept of “human connection,” defined by our branding tagline NEWJOBPHORIA®, which is the excitement of bringing joy and freedom to the work lifestyle so our people (and clients) can reach their highest potential. Our entire workflow cultivates NEWJOBPHORIA® with candidates and employees throughout their engagement with SPECTRAFORCE. http://www.spectraforce.com

We have built our business by providing talent and project-based solutions, including Contingent, Permanent, and Statement of Work (SOW) services to over 130 clients in the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Costa Rica, and India. Key industries that we service include Technology, Financial Services, Life Sciences, Healthcare, Telecom, Retail, Utilities and Transportation.

Benefits: SPECTRAFORCE offers ACA compliant health benefits as well as dental, vision, accident, and hospital indemnity insurances. Additional benefits SPECTRAFORCE offers to the eligible employees include commuter benefits, 401K plan with matching and a referral bonus program. SPECTRAFORCEoffers unpaid leave as well as paid sick leave when required by law.

Equal Opportunity Employer: SPECTRAFORCEis an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, religion, color, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, disability or veteran status, or any other category protected by applicable federal, state, or local laws. Please contact Human Resources at nahr@spectraforce.com if you require reasonable accommodation.

Note: The Company is committed to complying with the California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”) effective January 1, 2020; and all data privacy and laws in the jurisdictions in which it recruits and hires employees. A Notice to California Job Applicants Regarding the Collection of Personal Information can be located on our website . Applicants with disabilities may access this notice in an alternative format by contacting NAhr@spectraforce.com .
company_about:
Established in 2004, SPECTRAFORCE is one of the largest and fastest-growing staffing firms in the U.S. The growth of our company is a direct result of our global client service delivery model powered by our state-of-the-art A.I. proprietary talent acquisition platform, robust ISO 9001:2015/ISO 27001 certified processes, and strong and passionate client-engaged teams. 

We have built our business by providing talent and project-based solutions, including Contingent, Permanent, and Statement of Work (SOW) services to over 130 clients in the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Costa Rica, and India. 

Key industries that we service include Technology, Financial Services, Life Sciences, Healthcare, Telecom, Retail, Utilities, and Transportation. 

SPECTRAFORCE is built on a concept of "human connection," defined by our branding attitude of NEWJOBPHORIA™, which is the excitement of bringing joy and freedom to the work lifestyle so our people (and clients) can reach their highest potential. Our entire workflow and teams are inspired to cultivate the joy of NEWJOBPHORIA with candidates and employees throughout their engagement at SPECTRAFORCE.

title: Web Developer
description:
Description
Judd Wire Inc., a Sumitomo Electric Group company, is looking for a Web Developer in our Turners Falls, MA facility. Individuals will be responsible for designing, developing and administration of Judd Wire Inc.’s Internet, Extranet and Intranet including: coordinating the content for Web pages throughout the organization; providing technical support for all hardware and software related to the Web and providing backup support for other systems as required.
Job Duties And Responsibilities
Gather, organize, and coordinate content to be published on company websites and other digital platforms. Ensure content is accurate and up-to-date. Design and code wed-based applications that cater to the specific needs of the company. Use best practices to create user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces. Assist in the development of information systems standards and procedures. Conduct testing and debugging of web-based applications to ensure they function seamlessly across different systems. Identify and resolve any issues during development process. Regularly update and maintain existing web pages and applications to reflect changes in company information. Implement improvements and optimizations. Monitor web traffic and performance to identify areas of improvement and ensure optimal website usability and speed. Implement performance optimization strategies to enhance experience. Provide expert technical support for software related to web-based systems, such as BPCS and I-Series. Assist users with any issues, troubleshoot problems, and implement effective solutions in timely manner. Provide project leadership for large or complex projects. Supervise the work of other programmers and/or consultants as necessary. Perform other similar or related duties as assigned or instructed by supervisor. 
Qualifications
Must have knowledge of HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, E-Commerce, Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services, cross-browser compatibility, Multimedia Content Development, Web Programing skills, API'sExcellent analytic skills. Attention to detail. Must have good time management, organization & written/verbal communication Ability to work with minimal supervision and self-motivatedTeam player
Benefits:
Medical, Dental and Vision FSA/HSA401(k) with Employer Match Life, AD&D and Disability PTO and Holidays Employee Assistance Program 
About Judd Wire, Inc.
Judd Wire, a Sumitomo Electric Group Company, is a high technology wire company, specializing in the use of electron beam crosslinked thermosets for wire insulation. By applying irradiation crosslinking technology to insulating materials, Judd Wire meets the needs of the wire and cable industry for economical, high-performance products. Judd Wire manufactures electronic wire and cable in over 100 styles recognized by Underwriters Laboratory, Canadian Standards and/or Military Specifications.
Judd Wire's two U.S. based factories are part of the Sumitomo Electric Industries, Ltd. (SEI), the largest manufacturer of wire and cable in Japan that provides Judd Wire with access to their extensive network of research and product development facilities.
To learn more about us, please visit https://sumitomoelectric.com.
About Sumitomo Electric Group
Since the founding of Sumitomo Electric Industries, Ltd. in 1897 with copper wire production, we have developed many new technologies and products through innovative R&D activities based on Sumitomo Electric manufacturing technologies for electric wires and power cables. With more than 350 subsidiaries worldwide, we continue to introduce a wide variety of products that fulfill the expectations of society, in five business fields: Automotive, Information & Communications, Electronics, Environment & Energy, and Industrial Materials. We are a Fortune global 500 company.
To learn more about Sumitomo Electric Group, please visit http://global-sei.com.
company_about:
The Sumitomo Electric Group is a global network of 414 group companies in 40 countries. The organization started in 1897 with the founding of Sumitomo Electric Industries, our parent company in Osaka, Japan. The company's original business was copper wire production for electric power cables. Since then, we have diversified into five major business segments: automotive, infocommunications, electronics, environment and energy, and industrial materials. Today, the Sumitomo Electric Group employs more than 280,000 people worldwide.

For more information about the Sumitomo Electric Group, please visit our corporate website at https://sumitomoelectric.com

title: UI/UX Developer- Colorado Springs, CO
description:
La Jolla Logic is looking for qualified (Colorado Springs, CO) to support development and fielding of Defensive Cyber Operations capabilities for the US Space Force utilizing DevSecOps environments and lean agile practices in order to establish enterprise level safeguards such as computer and network systems security and cyber situational awareness, damage assessment and recovery, cyber threat recognition, attribution, and mitigation, and active response methodologies across Enterprise Ground Services (EGS) in response to evolving threats and changes to cyber environment.

The program’s goal is to ensure delivery of critical infrastructure services and limit or contain the impact of a potential cybersecurity event and to protect the following mission sets: Protected Communications, Missile Warning, Military Strategic Communications (MILSATCOM), Position Navigation and Timing (PNT), Ballistic Missile Command and Control, Space Domain Awareness (SDA), Nuclear Command Control and Communications (NC3), and Command and Control Satellite Operations (C2 Sat Ops).

Salary Range: $100,000-$135,000

Responsibilities
Broad knowledge of a domain and a developing knowledge of additional skills related to the domain; applies standard principles, theories, concepts, and techniques.Works as part of a team under minimal supervision/instruction on routine work, and general instructions for new work; non-routine decisions, duties, and work may be reviewed by more senior staff; monitors own progress on assigned tasks and may train and mentor new members of a team.Develops documents/artifacts, with minimum peer/Sr level review. Solves a variety of problems, applying standard professional concepts and methodologies. Works on diverse problems requiring evaluation of identifiable factors with full use and application of established practices.Seek to understand how users’ intentions, needs, and behaviors inform service/product design and strategy.Gather and evaluate user requirements to create both functional and appealing features to address client needs.Turn business goals and requirements into illustrated designed ideas using wireframes, prototypes, storyboards, and process flow/site maps of future services/products.Conduct user research and test ideas, using the data and analysis to validate design and inform decisions.Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how each will function and what they will look like.Ensure designs turn into tangible products, taking ownership of reviewing the finished product for functionality, and adjusting based on user feedback.Proactively identify, troubleshoot and resolve UX problems (i.e. responsiveness).Ensure that user interface and experience designs follow best practices and comply with security requirements.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, data science, software development or STEM related specialty.Secret security clearance: U.S. Citizenship is required.3-7 years' experience.Experience in at least 2 of the following Applications Frameworks: React, Angular, Python, JavaScript, CSS, HTML & Material UI.Familiarity & Knowledge: SIMP Project, Ansible, Docker, GIT, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL), Suricata, Zeek, Kibana, Logstash, Elastic Search, Neo4J, PostgreSQL.Experience or Knowledge in the following Areas: Agile software development, agile methodologies, agile project management, software project management, defensive cyber operations, software development life cycle management, program/project management, cross-functional team.Ability to obtain SAFe for Teams certification.
About La Jolla Logic

La Jolla Logic (LJL) is an advanced technology and information system security solutions firm founded in 2011 in San Diego, CA. LJL's mission is to provide reliable, high-quality, and best value advanced technology, specialty cybersecurity, engineering, and Development Security and Operations (DevSecOps) driven solutions to Department of Defense and commercial customers. LJL specializes in rapidly assessing, developing, and fielding/implementing advanced, secure technologies for DoD systems, including application of data analytics through Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML) and Cross Domain/high assurance systems enforcing mandatory access controls.

La Jolla Logic recently joined forces with Boecore and the opportunities are endless! Boecore is an aerospace and defense engineering company headquartered in Colorado Springs, CO that delivers engineering solutions in support of operational system development, fielding, and mission operations for the Space Force, Air Force, Missile Defense, and other DoD clients.

Over The Years Both LJL And Boecore Have Been Recognized For Its Leadership And Its Workplace Culture Through Numerous Awards, To Include
San Diego Business Journal (SDBJ) 2021 Women of Influence in Technology 2021SDBJ 100 Fastest Growing Private Companies 2020Union Tribune San Diego's Top Workplaces 2021Best Places to Work in San Diego (6 Years in a Row!) 2016-2022Inc 5000 Fastest Growing Companies 2020-20222020 Propatria Award – Extraordinary Employer SupportColorado Springs Business Alliance Company of the YearEntrepreneur of the Year AwardDoD Nunn-Perry Mentor Protégé AwardColorado ESGR Above and Beyond AwardColorado ESGR Pro Patria AwardBest Workplaces in Colorado Springs 2017 and 2021
Currently LJL Has a Competitive Compensation Package That Includes
Medical, Dental, and Vision Coverage401K MatchingEducational ReimbursementExtensive PTO for Vacation and Sick LeavePaid Holidays
Together La Jolla Logic and Boecore care deeply about the employee experience and employees’ career development.

Applicants requiring reasonable accommodations in the application and/or interview process should notify HR at hr@lajollalogic.com.

La Jolla Logic, a Boecore Company is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race, color, sex, religion, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state, or local laws. This policy applies to all employment practices within our organization, including hiring, recruiting, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, leave of absence, compensation, benefits, training, and apprenticeship. La Jolla Logic makes hiring decisions based solely on qualifications, merit, and business needs at the time.

company_about:
La Jolla Logic (LJL) is an advanced technology and information system security solutions firm headquartered in San Diego, CA.  LJL's mission is to provide reliable, high-quality, and best value advanced technology, specialty cybersecurity, engineering, and Development Security and Operations (DevSecOps) driven solutions to Department of Defense and commercial customers.  

As a provider of world-class service and quality work products with a focus on a customer-centered cooperative work approach, our team specializes in the following areas:

Our superior work ethic and an impressive base of repeat customers make our staff the right choice for addressing your challenging information system & technology needs.

title: Junior Backend Engineer - US/Canada
description:
Junior Backend Engineer - US/Canada Residents only, Full-Time, Salary $60K-$70K. 
Minimum 1 year of project experience required - fully remote position. Freshers are also encouraged to apply.
About us: The Future of AI is Patterned We are a stealth-mode technology startup that is revolutionizing the way AI is used. Our platform uses pattern recognition to train AI models that are more accurate, efficient, and robust than ever before.
We are backed by top investors, including Sequoia and Andreessen Horowitz, and we are hiring for almost everything! If you are passionate about AI and want to be a part of something big, then we want to hear from you.
Make a positive impact on the world. Be a part of a fast-growing startup. If you are interested in learning more, please visit our website.
We Are Looking For People Who Are
Passionate about AI.
Excellent problem solvers.
Team players.
Driven to succeed.
Job Summary
We are seeking a highly motivated Junior Backend Engineer - US/Canada to join our team. In this role, you will collaborate with a cross-functional team of developers, designers, and product managers to build and maintain scalable and efficient backend systems. You will play a key role in implementing new features, optimizing performance, and ensuring the reliability of our applications. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who is passionate about backend development and wants to grow their skills in a dynamic and challenging environment.
Responsibilities
Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, and maintain backend systems that meet the needs of our applications.Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code using best practices.Implement new features and functionality based on product requirements.Optimize backend systems for performance, scalability, and reliability.Troubleshoot and resolve software defects and issues in a timely manner.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration between the backend and frontend components.Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and provide constructive feedback.Stay up to date with industry trends and technologies related to backend development.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.Strong understanding of backend development principles and concepts.Proficiency in at least one backend programming language such as Python, Java, or Ruby.Familiarity with web frameworks (e.g., Django, Spring, Ruby on Rails).Experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and writing efficient SQL queries.Knowledge of RESTful APIs and experience in building and consuming them.Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
Preferred Qualifications
Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.Familiarity with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra).Understanding of containerization and orchestration technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks.Exposure to frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Active participation in open-source projects or personal coding projects.
Special Benefits You Will Love
Flexible vacation, paid unlimited holidays, and paid sick days
401(k) with up to 2% employer match
Health, vision, and dental insurance
Why Patterned Learning AI?
Patterned Learning AI is made up of incredibly bright, mission-driven coworkers who are passionate about using technology to solve real world problems---and we're growing quickly. In order to continue building an engaging and dynamic organization, we're committed to giving everyone the support they need to do great work.

title: Digital Graphic Designer
description:
Our customers love us and so will you! Rockler is a family-owned business that helps woodworkers and do-it-yourselfers create amazing projects out of wood through innovative products, education and advice.
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Digital Graphic Designer to lead the visual design efforts for our digital marketing initiatives. In this role, you will be responsible for creating captivating graphics for our website, as well as designing ads tailored for PPC, Display, social media, and other digital advertising channels. Your expertise in web design and knowledge in HTML, CSS, and responsive design will be crucial to ensuring a seamless integration of your designs into our digital platforms. Collaborating closely with the marketing team and web developers, you will play a pivotal role in shaping our brand's visual identity and delivering compelling user experiences to drive engagement and conversions.
Major Areas Of Accountability
Design visually engaging graphics for our website, focusing on user experience and brand consistency. Conceptualize and create eye-catching ads for digital advertising campaigns, optimizing designs for various platforms. Ensure responsive design principles are applied to all graphical elements, delivering a seamless experience across devices. Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project requirements and objectives, aligning designs with marketing goals. Maintain and uphold brand identity guidelines, consistently reflecting the brand's essence in all digital graphic designs. Adapt graphics for multiple digital platforms and ad formats, catering to specific requirements and specifications. 
Requirements For Position
Bachelor's degree in graphic design, Visual Communication, or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of professional experience as a Digital Graphic Designer. Minimum of 3 years of experience with HTML and CSS and an understanding of responsive design principles. Expertise in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) for creating and refining digital artwork. Experience in image editing software, enabling the creation, editing, and optimization of graphical elements. Familiarity with Bootstrap or other front-end frameworks for designing responsive and mobile-friendly websites. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and meet deadlines. Knowledge of digital advertising platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Social Media Ads) to design graphics tailored for specific ad formats. 
Rockler Companies is an Equal Opportunity Employer Committed to Inclusion and Diversity. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran
Job Posted by ApplicantPro
company_about:
Is there anything more satisfying than building something lasting with your own two hands?  Whether you're refinishing an antique chair, upgrading your kitchen cabinets, or taking a pile of wood and creating a family heirloom, woodworking brings out the best in all of us.

Your efforts and skill are appreciated at Rockler, a family-owned business celebrating over 65 years of woodworking. Despite being one of the largest online resources for woodworkers with a chain of stores across the country, we still take a personal interest in every one of your projects. We have real people in our Minnesota headquarters answering the phones. We work tirelessly to bring the industry's most innovative products, thinking, and education to both our physical locations and online store.  You can always trust Rockler to deliver quality products and impeccable customer service. 

Founded in 1954, Rockler Woodworking and Hardware provides woodworkers and DIYers with quality tools, hardware, wood and know-how. Rockler is known among professional and hobby woodworkers as the go-to source for innovative tools, jigs and shop accessories. Whether you're building a simple bookshelf, a custom desk, or a whole kitchen full of cabinets, Rockler has the tools, hardware, and supplies to make your project a success.

Like what you see?  Share this passion for excellence?  Come work for us! http://www.rockler.com/careers/

title: Junior Software Engineer
description:
Job Description
Job Summary
As a Software Engineer I, you are part of an agile team that works to enhance, design, and deliver the software components to the firm's state-of-the-art technology products in a secure, stable, and scalable way. As an entry-level member of a software engineering team, you execute basic software solutions through the design, development, and troubleshooting of a single technical area within a business function, while gaining skills and experience to grow within your role.
Job Responsibilities
Executes basic software solutions, design, development, and technical troubleshootingWrites secure and high-quality code using the syntax of at least one programming language with peer guidanceInterprets architecture and design representations as well as nonfunctional requirements to develop secure, stable software against a defined architectureActively applies automation to reduce manual toil in the Software Development Life CycleAddresses basic code quality issuesGathers, analyzes and synthesizes basic data sets in service of technical troubleshooting and generating insights to drive continuous improvementsBreaks down routine technical tasks to troubleshoot and solve issues
Required Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills
Baseline knowledge of software, applications and technical processes within a given technical discipline (e.g., cloud, artificial intelligence, Android, etc.)Ability to work in large, collaborative teams to achieve organizational goals, with a passion to build an inclusive and innovative cultureDemonstratable ability to code in one or more languagesUnderstanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance, and software improvementProficiency in developmental toolsetsBasic knowledge of industry-wide technology trends and best practices
Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities, And Skills
Exposure to cloud technologies Additional Information
12 month contract to hire
Full-time
company_about:
KGS is Incorporated in India in 2008 with headquarter in Alpharetta, GA, is a leading multinational software development and IT Consulting company that has successfully served the business community for over five years in onshore and over Ten years in Offshore, since its incorporation, KGS IT GROUP has provided a wide variety of excellent customized IT solutions to its customers on time and on budget. KGS has proven itself as an industry leading.KGS 

TECHNOLOGY GROUP continues to strategically build its multiple practices to deliver cutting edge customized design to meet the unique needs of its customers across diverse industries. KGS’s consultants have been recognized for their technical capabilities, business knowledge and commitment to excellence. KGS has a global presence with offices in the US and India.

With 150+ employees , KGS has demonstrated its commitment to customer satisfaction and innovation through its professional service offerings IT Consulting, Product Development, Business Technology Services & IT Consulting Services. We help organizations operate more productively and profitably through a full suite of Out of the Box configuration and custom IT solutions and products.

title: Web Developer-Designer * Hybrid Office Schedule
description:
Job Details
Description
The Wasserstrom Company is a national leading Food Service Distributor. Established in 1902, we are a family-owned company headquartered in Columbus, Ohio. Are you ready to make a change? We have an exciting opportunity for an experienced Web Developer & Designer. This is your chance to leverage your technical skills & creative flair in an organization that values innovation, collaboration, & the pursuit of excellence. You'll be part of a dynamic, close-knit team where your contributions will directly impact our success. In addition to a competitive salary, we offer a generous benefits package & the chance to grow professionally within a reputable & expanding company. Join us & help shape the future of food service distribution! Your next career adventure starts here. Apply today!
 The Wasserstrom Company is currently operating under a hybrid schedule that incorporates both teleworking and in-office hours. Employees may be required to report to the office when requested by leadership &/or for their initial job training. 
Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following. Other duties may be assigned.
Design and develop visually appealing and responsive websites that provide exceptional user experiences across multiple devices, with a focus on mobile design.Ensure technical compliance with ADA (Americans with Disabilities Act) standards to make our websites accessible to all users.Implement technical Search Engine Optimization (SEO) strategies to improve website visibility and search engine rankings.Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, marketers, and content creators, to translate business requirements into engaging and functional web solutions.Create and maintain front-end coding using HTML5 and CSS3, adhering to best practices and industry standards.Conduct website testing and debugging to identify and resolve any performance or compatibility issues.Stay up to date with the latest web development and design trends, tools, and techniques, and propose innovative ideas to enhance our online presence.Reports to, receives direction from and supports the Director of eCommerce Operations & Marketing.
Qualifications
3-5 years related experience in Interactive Production Design and competency in:
ActiveCampaignAdobe Creative Cloud: Photoshop, Illustrator, XD, DreamweaverAdobe Dynamic Media ClassicHTML, CSS (light JavaScript knowledge is a bonus)WebSphereWordPressEmail Layout designOnline AdvertisingAccessibility issues – ensure that web production work is ADA Section 508 compliant.
Wasserstrom offers a complete benefits package including medical, dental, vision, 401(k), profit sharing, and immediate accrual of paid time off and paid holidays.
EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability
We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and will give consideration to all applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status or disability.
company_about:
Headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, The Wasserstrom Company is the world's leading restaurant supplier and distributor of foodservice supplies and equipment. Since 1902, Wasserstrom has provided foodservice operators with high quality products, like kitchen supplies and catering supplies, from the industry's leading manufacturers.

Wasserstrom, which began as a local, family-run business, has steadily grown to become one of the largest suppliers of foodservice products.  With over a century of experience and a team of over 1,500 dedicated associates, Wasserstrom remains a family owned and operated company, offering products and services that are second to non.

Wasserstrom was chosen as the "2014 Dealer of the Year"​ by Foodservice Equipment & Supplies magazine and its readers.  This is the highest honor in our industry and Wasserstrom is the first 3-time winner of this award.  It is because of the hard work, dedication to customer service and passions for excellence of each and every one of our associates, that we have been chosen for this prestigious award.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Description
MMRI is looking for a talented and experienced full stack developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our suite of custom-built web-based research administration applications. You will work closely with the scientists and the grant administration team to design, build, and deploy user-friendly and scalable web applications that meet the needs of the institute.
Responsibilities
Develop and maintain web-based applications using a variety of technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, Python, and PHP.Design and implement user interfaces that are functional and aesthetic.Work with the grant administration team to understand their requirements and translate them into technical specifications.Troubleshoot and debug applications.Deploy and maintain applications in a development and production environment.Stay up to date on the latest technologies and trends in web development.
Compensation & Benefit Package
We offer a competitive salary and benefit package:
 Medical insurance Dental insurance Vision insurance GENEROUS paid time off 7 paid holidays 403(b) plan Tuition Reimbursement Gym Membership And more!
Requirements
 Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field. 3+ years of experience as a full stack developer. Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and at least one server-side language. Proficiency in data formatting technologies like XML, XSL, JSON, YAML. Experience with web/application servers: NGINX, Apache, Tomcat, strong linux skills (specifically in Ubuntu Server LTS releases). Experience with utility coding languages: FTP, SSH, SCP, Shell Scripting. Experience with object-oriented programming and design patterns. Experience with database management systems: MySQL, SQL SERVER and PostgreSQL and MongoDB. Experience with version control systems. Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Additional Requirements
 Experience with the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a plus. Experience with developing web applications for a variety of industries is a plus. Strong understanding of security principles and best practices. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Salary Range: From $60,0000 annually DOE
 To learn more about us, please visit our website at: https://www.mmri.edu
company_about: Masonic Medical Research Institute is a not-for-profit institute dedicated to improving the health and quality of life for all.  The Laboratory's primary mission is to conduct high quality basic and clinical research aimed at generating knowledge and information necessary for development of medical cures and treatments of tomorrow.  The Laboratory is also committed to providing education and training to basic scientists, clinical researchers and students who will perpetuate and extend the fight against disease.

title: Junior Software Engineer
description:
SYNERGISTICIT is aware that the Job Market is Challenging because of Tech Layoffs. The Job market is flooded with hundreds and thousands of laid-off Jobseekers competing with existing Jobseekers. For entry-level Job seekers to get client interviews and jobs they need to differentiate themselves by ensuring they have exceptional skills and technologies to be noticed by clients.
Since 2010 we have helped Jobseekers differentiate themselves by providing clients with candidates who have the requisite skills and experience to outperform at interviews and clients. Here at SynergisticIT We just don't focus on getting you a Job we make careers. All Positions are open for all visas and US citizens We at Synergisticit understand the problem of the mismatch between employer's requirements and Employee skills and that's why since 2010 we have helped thousands of candidates get jobs at technology clients like Apple, Google, and Paypal, western union, Client, visa, Walmart labs, etc., to name a few. We have an excellent reputation with the clients. Currently, we are looking for Junior Software Engineer
Who Should Apply Recent Computer Science/Engineering /Mathematics/Statistics or Science Graduates looking to make their careers in IT Industry We welcome candidates with all visas and citizens to apply. We assist in filing for STEM extension and also for H1b and Green card filing to Candidates
We also offer Skill enhancement programs for candidates who are either missing skills or lacking Industry/Client experience with Projects and skills. Candidates have difficulty finding jobs or cracking interviews or want to improve their skill portfolio. If they are qualified with enough skills and have hands-on project work with clients then no need for skill enhancement.
Candidates can benefit from skill enhancement if they fall into the below categories.
Candidates who Lack Experience or are fresher with No actual Job experience with projects with clients who Have had a break in careers Lack Technical Competency or skills being demanded by clients Different visa candidates (Like OPT/H4EAD/L2EAD) who want to get employed and settle down in the USA please check the below links to see success outcomes of our candidates https://www.synergisticit.com/candidate-outcomes/
Watch the below videos of us participating in Industry events with the Top companies in Technology at Oracle Cloud World/Oracle Java One (Las Vegas) and at Gartner Data Analytics Summit (Florida)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EmO7NrWHkLM https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NVBU9RYZ6UI
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yy74yvjatVg SynergisticIT at Gartner Data and Analytics Summit 2023 - YouTube
https://www.synergisticit.com/java-track/ https://www.synergisticit.com/data-science-track/ https://www.synergisticit.com/contact-us/
If you have relevant skills and industry experience, please apply if not then candidates can opt for Skill enhancement.
For getting help with interviews please visit
https://www.synergisticit.com/interview-questions/
REQUIRED SKILLS For Java /Software Programmers
 Bachelor's degree or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Information Systems, IT Highly motivated, self-learner, and technically inquisitive Experience in programming language Java and understanding of the software development life cycle Project work on the skills Knowledge of Core Java, java script, C++ or software programming Spring boot, Micro-services, Docker, Jenkins and REST API's experience Excellent written and verbal communication skills
For data Science/Machine learning
Required Skills
 Bachelor's degree or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Information Systems, IT Project work on the technologies needed Highly motivated, self-learner, and technically inquisitive Experience in the programming language Java and understanding of the software development life cycle Knowledge of Statistics, SAS, Python, Computer Vision, and data visualization tools Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Preferred skills: NLP, Text mining, Tableau, Power BI, Time series analysis
Please understand skills and relevant experience on real-world projects are required by clients for selection even if it's a Junior or entry-level position the additional skills and Project work with hands-on experience building projects at the client site are the only way a candidate can be picked by clients. If not having the skills or hands-on project work at the client site, candidates can opt for skill enhancement to gain the required skills and project work. No third-party candidates or c2c candidates
please only apply to the posting
No phone calls, please. Shortlisted candidates would be reached out to.

title: Front End Developer
description:
Description

We are seeking a skilled and passionate Front End Developer to join our dynamic development team. As a Front End Developer, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement innovative web applications that provide exceptional user experiences. You will be responsible for creating visually appealing and responsive interfaces, optimizing website performance, and ensuring seamless integration with back-end systems. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of front-end technologies, excellent problem-solving skills, and a keen eye for detail.

Responsibilities

Develop and implement engaging user interfaces for web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.

Collaborate with designers and back-end developers to translate wireframes and mockups into functional websites or applications.

Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following industry best practices and coding standards.

Optimize application performance by identifying and resolving front-end-related issues.

Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure cross-browser and cross-device compatibility.

Stay up-to-date with emerging front-end technologies and industry trends to suggest improvements and implement innovative solutions.

Work closely with the UX/UI team to ensure seamless user experiences and visual consistency.

Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate front-end components with server-side logic.

Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to maintain code quality and ensure adherence to coding standards.

Troubleshoot and resolve front-end issues or bugs reported by users or the QA team.

Continuously optimize and enhance existing web applications to improve performance, usability, and scalability.

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).

Proven experience as a Front End Developer or similar role, with a strong portfolio of web development projects.

Proficiency in front-end web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).

Solid understanding of responsive web design principles and mobile-first development.

Experience with front-end build tools, package managers, and version control systems (e.g., Webpack, npm, Git).

Knowledge of UI/UX principles and the ability to collaborate effectively with designers.

Familiarity with front-end testing frameworks and methodologies.

Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.

Excellent attention to detail and ability to translate design concepts into clean and efficient code.

Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment, as well as independently on assigned tasks.

Good communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience with server-side programming languages and frameworks (e.g., Node.js, Django, Ruby on Rails).

Knowledge of back-end technologies and database systems.

Understanding of SEO principles and best practices.

Familiarity with accessibility standards and guidelines (e.g., WCAG).

Experience with UI/UX design tools (e.g., Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma).

Robert Half puts you in the best position to succeed by advocating on your behalf and promoting you to employers. We provide access to top jobs, competitive compensation and benefits, and free online training. Stay on top of every opportunity – even on the go.

title: School Webmaster (BH)
description:
Each school will have a designated School Webmaster to manage the school’s website and individual web pages, following the website redesign. The School Webmaster will be responsible for managing their school’s web page in accordance with School District 308 Web and Communications Standards. The position will pay a stipend (Schedule A, Category 2) and be appointed by the school’s principal.
Responsibilities Posting news stories onto the school’s web page according to District standards.Training teachers and staff on how to create and manage teacher and group pages.Managing the school’s website calendar.Managing and posting to the school’s social media accounts (Facebook and Twitter).Managing and updating photos and photo slideshows on the school’s site according to district standards.Sharing at least one story per month with the School District 308 Communications Department featuring an event, students or staff from the school (no more than 150 words).Teacher Feature / Staff SpotlightServing as the school’s primary contact for all building-level questions regarding the website.Attend training, webinars and informational sessions as needed (monthly/quarterly).Receiving and sharing tips, issues and topics of discussion amongst all district web page masters.Writing and editing content for school’s website.Designing webpage layout (as needed).Determining technical requirements.Updating school website.Creating backup files. Qualifications:
Some knowledge of HTML, CSS, graphics, W3C and web standards.Knowledge of some web development environment tools (Dreamweaver, Visual Studio, FrontPage).Proficient with Microsoft Office.Fundamentals of photo editing (Adobe Photoshop).Basic understanding of web design.Content management knowledge (Preferred).Ability to solve basic code problems.
company_about:
With an enrollment of over 18,000 students, School District 308 is the eighth largest public PreK-12 school district in Illinois. Our school system encompasses 68.8 square miles and educates students from all of Oswego, and portions of Aurora, Joliet, Montgomery, Plainfield and Yorkville. The school district operates on a $200 million budget and includes 22 schools. 

At a time when the economy remains somewhat stagnant across Illinois, School District 308 continues to grow. The district’s student enrollment has nearly doubled over the last ten years. The fact that more and more parents select School District 308 to educate their children makes it an exciting time to be a part of our school system.

Let there be no mistake: the relentless pursuit of world-class teacher instruction and student achievement will be priority #1. Whether you are a citizen or a parent, please join us in that pursuit. If you are considering moving within our school district, I hope you consider the many advantages of School District 308.

title: UI / UX Designer
description:
Company Description
VEA is an award winning, nationally recognized, small, minority company based in Washington, DC.
Job Description
Responsible for interacting with clients to gather requirements. Develop Personas, Journey Maps, storyboards, wireframes, mockups, and design elements. Developing low-to-high fidelity mockups to present to the client. Working with developers to hand off design to ensure pixel perfect delivery.
As part of the above, the candidate will design applications utilizing Human Centered Design and Design thinking principles as well as best practices for software development methodologies, ensuring their work is compliant, efficient, and effective. Team members are responsible for system design and playing a vital role throughout the entire development lifecycle. Members of the team must also possess the aptitude to search for answers when they are easily accessible
Duties
Design and deliver wireframes, user journeys, mockups, and prototypes optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces per client requirementsMonitor and know wider industry UX trends and relevant technology trendsCreate designs that are on-brand for our clients and follow a project’s creative vision and business strategy while putting the user firstCollaborate with other groups like developers, engagement managers, and UX designers to deliver high-quality, creative designs for both internal and client-facing projects Qualifications
Experience working in an Agile development methodologyExperience with collaboration tools, such as Jira and ConfluenceExperience using Human Centered Design principlesExperience with wireframes, mockups, prototypes leading towards client sign-offWorking knowledge of HTML and CSS
Desired Skills:
4+ years of experience in UI/UX designPortfolio of previous workKnowledge of responsive design and user experience design principles
Additional Information
Candidate MUST have an Active TS/SCI Only and be located in the Washington DC Metro Area.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any additional federal, local or state protected class.
company_about:
Virtual Enterprise Architects, LLC (VEA) is a small disadvantaged, woman and minority owned company that has a track record of delivering high quality management consulting services to public and private clients. VEA is the 2014 Small Business Administration’s Small Business of the Year for DC and 2014 SmartCEO’s Emerging Technology Implementer of the Year. VEA is also the 2013 Industry Solutions Provider of the Year by the Government Technology Research Alliance (GTRA). 

VEA consultants have a wealth of experience and educational backgrounds that contribute to client projects. VEA consultants hold active clearances and certifications in one or more of the following: Enterprise Architecture, ITIL, Project Management, Network Management and Information Security. 

VEA’s mission is to provide holistic consulting to integrate the strategy, business and technology needs of our customers. We transform clients from its current state into the future state by transforming first the minds of its leaders, the core business processes and its infrastructure. VEA specializes in enterprise architecture, strategic planning, capital planning, proposal management, contract administration, financial management, IT program/project management, requirements management and analysis, information security, systems design/engineering, data architecture, network engineering and test planning.

title: Associate Visual Designer
description:
About Buildout
Buildout is the full-lifecycle empowerment platform and system of record for high-performing CRE brokers in highly competitive markets. With seamless deal-making functionality from start to finish, Buildout gives brokers a proven platform that's optimized for CRE brokers and capable of providing deeper, more detailed market, property and owner insights; powerful automations for prospecting, pitching, marketing, and transacting; and reliably accurate pipeline management tools with real-time reporting. Buildout has become the not-so-secret weapon for more than 50,0000 brokers and top CRE brokerage firms to find, win, market, and transact more listings, at top dollar.
The Opportunity
The Visual Design team works effectively and efficiently to deliver a best in-class marketing solution to our customers, from bringing their existing marketing to life to developing new materials that help elevate their brand. We're looking for a designer to join the Visual Design team with an ability to think creatively through problems and work across a variety of coding languages and platforms to find innovative solutions for our customers. You should be comfortable explaining your thought process and able to receive feedback from your peers. You will be a part of a diverse and driven team that challenges each other to create and maintain the quality marketing standards our customers have come to expect across emails, websites, and documents.
How You'll Contribute At Buildout
Use Buildout's proprietary tools to customize and update marketing documents, emails, and web materials to align with customers' use casesPartner with other teams at Buildout, primarily those in the Revenue Dept, to understand customers' needs in order to deliver timely marketing solutions within Buildout's platformSupport our pre-sale processes which can include:Getting on calls with our Sales team and prospective customers to discuss capabilities of the application or their specific brand needsCreating sample marketing materials for prospective customersProvide proactive solutions to our customers' marketing problems that help ensure their long-term success using the applicationBe welcomed into the innovative and collaborative Buildout team. Get to know your teammates and work in sync to deliver a world-class, end-to-end customer experienceMake mistakes, improve for the next time, and develop enviably thick-skin from these experiences to propel you through the rest of your career, at Buildout and beyondTake the work, but not yourself, seriously
What You'll Bring To Buildout
2+ years of experience working as a Graphic Designer, Web Developer, or Email Designer Experience with HTML & CSS coding on an established platform A portfolio of varied design projects which demonstrates a strong eye for design and ability to adhere to brand standardsEmpathy and solutions-oriented. You're able to put yourself in the customers' shoes, understand their needs and goals, and offer solutions that will drive them forwardWillingness to engage with customers directly to:Reduce thrash and help resolve problems quicklyConvey complex ideas in simple terms Discuss unique brand and marketing needsSupport internal teams' ability to service our customersAbility to balance working as an individual contributor and as part of a team, while proactively seeking opportunities for improvementJavascript experience is a plus but not requiredCommercial Real Estate experience is nice to have but not required 
We know there are great candidates who won't check all of these boxes, and we also know you might bring important skills that we haven't considered. If that's you, don't hesitate to apply and tell us about yourself.
We are based in Chicago, but this is a remote-friendly role open across most of the US. The salary range for this position is $49,300 - $66,700 depending on your experience.
Perks & Benefits
We built a benefits program to match the quality of our team. This program includes:
Impactful insurance and benefit options, including offering plans that cover 100% of employee health insurance premiums, and company-paid STD, LTD, life insurance, and telemedicine Policies that support a healthy work/life balance, including Flexible PTO, company holidays, paid parental leave, and give back days401(k) with 4% company match and immediate vestingAn office in Chicago for those who prefer an office setting, plus a monthly remote work reimbursement Challenging problems to solve with a committed and supportive team who are invested in your growth and developmentA wonderfully quirky culture where you're encouraged to bring your whole self to work
Buildout is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, genetic information, marital status, order of protection status, citizenship status, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law.
If you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please contact us by email at accommodations@buildout.com and let us know the nature of your request and your contact information and we will consider your request.
Below, you will be asked to complete identity information for the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC). It is required by law that we ask these questions using the format provided by the EEOC. However, we want you to know that at Buildout, we understand that gender is not binary and welcome people of all identities.
For more information about our privacy practices please visit our Privacy Policy. California residents have additional rights and should review the Additional Disclosures for California Residents section in our Privacy Policy.

With seamless deal-making functionality from start to finish, Buildout gives brokers a proven platform that’s optimized for CRE brokers and capable of providing deeper, more detailed market, property and owner insights; powerful automations for prospecting, pitching, marketing, and transacting; and reliably accurate pipeline management tools with real-time reporting. Buildout has become the not-so-secret weapon for more than 50,0000 CRE brokers to find, win, market, and transact more listings, at top dollar.

description:
The UX/UI Designer will design experiences that help our partners understand our business process and achieve customer success. Our partners are vital to our growth as we partner with more than 50 Point of Sale (POS) and 100 ordering platform partners. You’re an exceptional designer and a great communicator. You’re a team player, partnering with product managers, growth and partnership team, engineers, operational leads, and our design team, to ensure our partners feel ecstatic working with us.
This role is 100% remote, full-time.
Salary Range - 90K - 100K
Essential Job Functions
Owning the end-to-end user experience and design strategy for all our partner personas Inventing and evolving new visual and interaction designs based on experience, requirements, brand guidelines, and user needs Create user-focused designs (mockups, prototypes), informed by feedback, requirements, and your user research Collaborating with other designers, growth and partner managers, product managers, operation leads, and technologists Advocating for design excellence, craftsmanship, and usability in all aspects of the onboarding experience Primarily responsible for developing UI designs related to Onboarding UI and AR products
Requirements
3+ years of experience working with internal tools, such as CRMsDistinguished portfolio of modern and progressive UI architecture, interaction and visual designs Proficiency using contemporary design tools to solve complex problems and communicate in visually stunning detail - we use Illustrator, Photoshop, and Figma. Experience measuring and testing your designs against business metrics and analyzing user experience flows for improved partner success BA or MA/MS Degree in Human-Computer Interaction, Web Design, or related field or work experience as a designerKnowledge with CSS, HTML, Javascript, and frontend frameworks (i.e. React) A personal love of what we’re building

─ 21K+ Live locations

What We Do:

ItsaCheckmate provides a comprehensive two-way integration solution that not only connects your POS with the evolving on-demand world but also equips you with powerful monitoring and reporting tools to drive maximum revenue, profitability, and efficiency.
